content: I'll be driving my friend's Ford F-150, which has a decent fuel efficiency of around 20 miles per gallon on the highway. There will be 4 of us traveling, and we'll have a moderate amount of camping gear. We're planning to drive from San Francisco to the Grand Canyon, and we'll be stopping at the Hoover Dam and Monument Valley along the way. We'll spend around 3-4 days at the Grand Canyon, and we'll be driving around the South Rim.
